Detailed Description

Special class for rendering arbitrary triangles to the screen.

const int &  blendMode = BLEND_DEFAULT_Z 
)

Add a new Triangle to be rendered by the TriangleRenderable.

Parameters:
vert1 The coordinates of the first vertex.
vert2 The coordinates of the second vertex.
vert3 The coordinates of the third vertex.
uv1 The texture coordinates of the first vertex.
uv2 The texture coordinates of the second vertex.
uv3 The texture coordinates of the third vertex.
color1 The color of the first vertex.
color2 The color of the second vertex.
color3 The color of the third vertex.
texture The int handle of the texture to be used.
blendMode The blending mode to use with the new triangle.

Definition at line 91 of file TriangleRenderable.cpp.

void TriangleRenderable::render ( SceneNode *const   node,
const hgeVector &  screenPosition,
Camera *const   cam 
) [virtual]

Core render method.

The other render methods call this method once it has been determined that the object should be rendered. This is the Template method.

Parameters:
node The node whose position, rotation, and scale are going to be used to render the object.
screenPosition The position to render the object at transformed into screen space.

Implements Renderable.
